## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Describe the pain point or gap in the current functionality.

_Example: "When I run a pipeline for a large project, I have no way to see which agent is currently running or how long it has been active."_

## Proposed Solution

Describe what you'd like to see. Be as specific as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative approaches you've thought about and why you ruled them out.

## User Impact

Who benefits from this change? How many users? How often do they hit this problem?

- [ ] All users
- [ ] OWNER / MANAGER roles only
- [ ] Specific workflow (describe): ___
